original_text: For laying aside the commandment of God, ye hold the tradition of men, as the washing of pots and cups: and many other such like things ye do.
korean_text: 너희가 하나님의 계명은 버리고 사람의 전통을 지키느니라

sentences.original_text: For laying aside the commandment of God
ye hold the tradition of men
as the washing of pots and cups
sentences.korean_translation: 예를 들면 그릇과 잔 씻는 것과 같은

sentences.original_text: and many other such like things
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 이와 비슷한 다른 많은 것들을
